1604064736_mirrored_HelloZeroNet_github.body: isnt the problem with bittorrent protocol/client for big-files losing any protection from Tor?
Without Tor compatibility does mean users will be clear/unmasked?

1604064865_mirrored_HelloZeroNet_github.body:
Agree, would be awesome if zero:// would work outofthebox as standard
without plugin.

1604065509_mirrored_ghost_github.body:
How does one increase limitation of MergerSite other than clicking on the MergerSite, which is usually "empty" frontend, then dragging the sidebar open and increase from there?

Since this is a bit confusing for new users, it would be great if there was an option directly on the startpage sidebar for the affected sites showing up in the "Running out of Space" section via the "..." dropdown menu, like "Increase SizeLimit" or "Adjust SizeLimit", which then opens the confirmation dialog to increase it.

1604066615_mirrored_haschimoto_github.body: Does GeoLite further ever contact a clearnet IP or URL (like maxmind.com) after been downloaded once?

topic.title: Question: Is Geolite DB download from within Zeronet? If not, can we make it so as Big File download? Is it ever contacting an outside IP or URL after download?
topic.body:
I mean this one time download without connecting to clearnet:

topic.title: "help distribute all files" option does not help to auto-download BigFiles?
topic.body:
enabling "help distribute all files" options in sidebar for merger + merged sites plus raising "auto download big file size limit" to 5000MB does still not seem to trigger downloading all available piecemaps and big files.

Is this a known limitation or should it actually work?
